title.rendered: Air Madagascar Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Air Madagascar, is an airline based in Antananarivo, Madagascar. It is the national airline of Madagascar operating services to Europe, Asia and neighbouring African and Indian Ocean island destinations, from its main base, Ivato International Airport in Antananarivo. It also operates an extensive domestic network.

The airline was formed in 1947 to feed into flights by Transports Aériens Intercontinentaux and Air France, and upon the independence of Madagascar, it became the national airline. Initially operating services on domestic routes, the airline saw expansion in the late 1960s and 1970s, when it began international flights to destinations such as France and South Africa.

Phone Number : Information : (+261) 34 02 222 42 – (+261) 34 02 222 10

Business hours :
Du Lundi au Vendredi : 09h00 – 17h30
Samedi : 09h00 – 12h00

Address : Immeuble La City 3000, Ivandry
Rez De Chaussée – Box 029
Antananarivo 101
MADAGASCAR

Email:  resa.corporate@airmadagascar.com, groupe@airmadagascar.com

SERVICE CARGO
FRET – AIR MADAGASCAR
AEROPORT IVATO
Antananarivo

Renseignements et réservation: (+261) 20 22 451 49
Email: reservationfret@airmadagascar.com

Confirmation d’arrivée

Phone Number: (+261) 20 22 222 222 – P. 1483 – 1523
(+261) 34 49 222 83
Email: DZFL@airmadagascar.com

Customer Service Fret

Phone Number: +261 20 22 514 78/79
+261 34 49 222 84

SERVICE RELATION CLIENTÈLE
Service Relation Clientèle Air Madagascar

Address: 17, Avenue de l’indépendance
Antananarivo 101
Madagascar

Email: customer@airmadagascar.com

Air Madagascar Official website: https://www.airmadagascar.com/

Air Madagascar Baggage Allowance

Air Madagascar Baggage Allowance

View Air Madagascar Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Air Madagascar Fleet

Fleet size: 11

  • Airbus A340-300
  • ATR 42-300
  • ATR 72-500
  • ATR 72-600
  • Boeing 737-300
  • Boeing 737-800

 Queries handled Air Madagascar Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy,Namako

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Madagascar in Antananarivo, Madagascar Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Madagascar in Antananarivo, Madagascar: (click on the stars below)
